lang.afterClickingSendLinkChangePassword: After clicking on Send, you will receive an email containing a link to change your password. This link will be active 1 hour.
lang.connectionServerFailed: The connection to the server failed. Please try again later.
lang.doubletapSignatureToAddDocument: Double-tap on a signature to add it to your document
lang.freeModeInfo:
You will only be able to annotate documents with the Apple stylus.
This has the advantage of being able to put your hand on the tablet without disturbing the writing.
lang.historyUseInfo: You can't use the last {{countPwd}} passwords.
lang.logInOncePasswordChanged: You will be asked to log in once the password has been changed.
lang.noteAndSignatureDeleted: Annotations / signatures deleted from the document
lang.refuseDocumentWithoutSignature: You are about to refuse this document without annotation!
lang.renewalInfo: Please note that this new password will only be valid on <b> {{time}} day(s) </ b>. After this time, you must choose a new one.
lang.replicateSignatureAllPage: Replicate the signature on all pages
lang.requestSentByEmail: The request has been sent to you by email.
lang.standardModeInfo: Standard mode, allowing annotation with any format (mouse, hand, stylus of any brand).
lang.subject: Subject
lang.validateDocumentWithoutSignOrNote: You are about to validate this document without signature or annotation!
lang.wantDeleteSignature: Do you want to delete this signature?
lang.wantDeleteSignatureOtherPage: Do you want to delete the signature on the other pages?
lang.wantSignOtherPage: Do you want to sign the other pages?
lang.notificationDocumentAddedBody:
A document has been sent to you on Maarch Parapheur.
Click on the link below to consult it :
lang.notificationFooter:
This email is automatically generated by Maarch Parapheur.
If you don't want to receive these notifications, mark it on your profile.
lang.notificationForgotPasswordBody:
Hello,
You requested to reset the password for your Maarch Parapheur account.
To change your password, please click on the link below :
lang.notificationForgotPasswordFooter:
If you did not perform this request, you can safely ignore this email.
Please contact your administrator if you have any questions.
lang.userForgottenPasswordUpdated: User password updated after forgot request
